name: PROTOTYP
tagline: Beautiful and performant apps and interfaces
description:
Discover, prototype, design and build apps and interfaces that look well, work well and hit targets. Bridge the gap between people and technology with beautiful and usable interfaces. Reach wide audiences with cross-platform progressive web apps, build rich mobile experiences for Android and iOS or go desktop with an Electron app.
Delivering greatness on time and budget.
We'll help you find that sweet spot between business goals and user happiness. From strategy and product design to development and market testing, we got your back. 
Tech stack that helps us deliver fast, feature-rich and scalable apps and interfaces:
 
React, Vue.js, Webpack, Gulp
PostCSS, SASS
PWA
React Native
Electron
.NET Core
NodeJS
SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Mongo
Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure
 
Let's start something great together!
Get in touch with Andrej (andrej@prototyp.digital) or Valentina (valentina@prototyp.digital) to set up an intro call, no strings attached. We are always super interested in fresh projects and reply within a day.
